infos.value: A stylish reversal!
At least that's what it was supposed to be...
Hm... Both sides are perfectly matched.
Huuuh!? You mean we're not being useful at all?
You are...?
King Robb!?
Wait, His Majesty is here...!
I am Deah. I hail from the kingdom of Ovis.
Oh...of Ovis, are you?
I entreat you. Please, dispatch troops to Ovis!
My motherland is on the verge of devastation at the hands of Rundall.
So they have invaded Ovis before continuing their onslaught eastward...
Your plea will not go unheeded.
Y-Your Majesty has my gratitude.
Rundall would have to be dealt with eventually. I am simply assuring you that it will be sooner rather than later.
And you all are...from Leonis, I take it?
Forgive our impudence. However, we have come to explain that—
We of Hourne and Leonis are no longer at war.
What!?
Our alliance with Fennes has been completely abolished.
I see. And so you cross swords with Sadali's monks.
Well, that certainly speeds things along.
We were given a message from Lady Machérie, to be delivered to the first-born prince of Leonis, Lord Mont.
From Machérie? Could you let me hear what she had to say?
"I'm waiting."
Is that all?
Actually...
What...? Machérie has been imprisoned!?
As it stands, she's to be taken to Leonis Castle...
I see. So it is Xiza and Vistralle...
Deah, my apologies.
We shall withdraw and make our way to Leonis Castle.
...Your kingdom should come first. That is to be expected.
I will send troops to Ovis as soon as this affair has been put in order. You have my word.
Thank you, Your Highness.
Tell «Solidus» on the front lines. The entire army is to retreat.
I won't allow it! I swear, this soil shall be your graves!
Hmm. And here I thought I might spare your lives…
Try us if you might. We will drive you down like lambs to the slaughter!
